paragraph1.text: I am José María Coronel, a web developer specialized in React, 24 years old, currently living in Portugal. My focus is on creating interactive and efficient interfaces.

paragraph2.title: MY BACKGROUND
paragraph2.text: I discovered programming out of curiosity and became self-taught in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, complementing with books and official documentation. I continue to expand my skills through constant practice.

paragraph3.title: FOCUS ON QUALITY AND ORGANIZATION
paragraph3.text: I am committed to accessibility, code reusability, and best practices. I am improving my Git management, especially in branch organization. Currently, I am exploring testing with Jest and React Testing Library, as well as Vite and Redux.

paragraph4.title: TOOLS AND DESIGN
paragraph4.text: I use Figma to design and prototype my projects, prioritizing a clean and minimalist style that optimizes user experience.
